channel.title: Updating Server
channel.description: Sorry guys i know this is a stupid question but i changed some of the server files to change the login messages but im not sure what to do after that i know im supposed to compile it but i don't know how to compile it. I downloaded JDK this is a 474. Please help

item.title: Updating Server
item.dc:creator: @Beastly-Scape Beastly-Scape
item.description:
@Beastly-Scape wrote:

aznboi594:

You need to run it with Command prompt. Make sure you have JDK in order to compile. Right click and press edit and change the directory if needed.

Can you tell me how to do that please? I have many people saying RELEASE SERVER RELEASE SERVER!Thanks

Read full topic

@aznboi594 wrote:

You need to run it with Command prompt. Make sure you have JDK in order to compile. Right click and press edit and change the directory if needed.

item.title: Updating Server
item.dc:creator: @Beastly-Scape Beastly-Scape
item.description:
@Beastly-Scape wrote:

[quote=“jailed, post:2, topic:358625”]aint there something named “compiler” in there? if there is, click it
if not, try to look for “build” or other names like that.[/quote]
Theres something named compile but when i try clicking it it asks what to use to run it with. no build thing please help guys

Read full topic

item.description:
@jailed wrote:

aint there something named “compiler” in there? if there is, click it
if not, try to look for “build” or other names like that.
